Uses of Class
uk.ac.tees.silver.L1087591.MalfunctionHandler

  • Packages that use MalfunctionHandler 
    Package Description
    uk.ac.tees.silver.L1087591
    This package contains the solution to the SILVER task for AJP-P4 which uses the Chain of responsibility design pattern with abstract class.

    • Uses of MalfunctionHandler in uk.ac.tees.silver.L1087591

      Subclasses of MalfunctionHandler in uk.ac.tees.silver.L1087591 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Captain
      Captain is the last possible state of the chain of responsibility.
      class  Engineer
      Engineer is the third possible state of the chain of responsibility.
      class  ServiceRobot
      ServiceRobot is the second possible state of the chain of responsibility.
      class  SpaceMonkey
      SpaceMonkey is the first possible state of the chain of responsibility.
